entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of the Weasley twins and is mentioned as interrupting Harry with his loud voice.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is also a Weasley twin and is mentioned as being angry about not getting answers from George.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story and is mentioned as having his questions answered by Sirius.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a member of the Order and is mentioned as calmly explaining to George that it's not his fault for not telling Harry what he needs to know.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as being sharp and placing emphasis on the importance of not telling Harry more than he needs to know.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having said something about not telling Harry more than he needs to know.

relationships.description: George and Fred are arguing with each other.
